title: Engineering Problem-Solving and Usability Evaluation Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based learning environment for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose usability issues of real products with 85% accuracy using the 3C3R model.
Learners can generate usability improvement proposals by applying an engineering problem-solving process in 4-member team units.
Learners can identify and propose improvements for three or more error types occurring during problem-solving processes through peer evaluation systems.

resources: Usability Evaluation Case Study Video Library
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
